reviewText: Very good faith and forgiveness story. Acting could be better, but makes doesn't affect the goodness to get the point across to youth especially. Also parents take note with trying to control your adult children too much it can back fire on you.
Bad acting and the Christians displayed in the movie seemed really disconnected with God, like they knew who God is, but as far as them really having a relationship with Him, they were oblivious.
Very interesting, shows the drama of dealing with a chemically addicted person well, but offers hope and healing
Great flick, at times the characters personalities were irritating but that's true to life.  Love the power of God.
